abstracts.cdata!:
The Private Sector Development Project
            for Bhutan had an overall satisfactory outcome, with the
            performances of both the Bank and the borrower being deemed
            satisfactory as well. The project development objective
            indicator as well as most of the intermediate outcome
            indicators were achieved fully and exceeded the target
            value, while one intermediate outcome indicator was achieved
            partially. The efficacy of the project is given a high
            rating. Significant lessons learned during the
            implementation of the project include: 1) the importance of
            evidence based policy making; 2) simple projects designed
            with few components requiring adequate amounts of funding
            can be as, if not more, successful than larger sized and
            overly ambitious projects; 3) a system to track the progress
            of medium-term impacts of the project's activities
            should be put in place during the design stage; 4) effective
            project coordination is critical; 5) creating short-term
            market distortions could sometimes be beneficial in the long
            term; 6) domestic private sector capacity often needs
            further strengthening to allow local firms to also
            participate; and 7) the shift from government training to
            private sector-led training might be beneficial in countries
            like Bhutan.

repnme.cdata!:
Bhutan - Private Sector Development (PSD)
            Project : restructuring

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Private Sector
            Development (PSD) Project is to increase productive
            employment in Bhutan through promotion of enterprise
            development in the IT/ITES, or Information Technology
            Enabled Services sector, enhanced IT skills, and improved
            access to finance. The Bhutan PSD Project achieved its
            project development objective (PDO) in March 2012. Project
            implementation has been satisfactory since effectiveness,
            except for a one time downgrade to moderately satisfactory
            due to a disbursement lag in June 2011, now resolved. The
            project has been given considerable due importance by the
            implementation agencies within their portfolio. Annex one
            presents more detail on implementation status, based on the
            project's tenth implementation support mission
            conducted from May 28 to June 8, 2012. Except for the
            undergrounding works of high voltage power lines over the IT
            park under component one and a financial literacy campaign
            under component three of the project, all activities are
            expected to be concluded by June 30, 2012.

            Development (PSD) Project : restructuring (Vol. 2) : Data sheet

14008792.trustfund: TF040510-BT:  PS DIALOGUE; PK PSD POLICY NOTE

repnme.cdata!:
Bhutan - Private Sector Development Project
            : restructuring

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Private Sector
            Development Project is to increase productive employment in
            Bhutan through promotion of enterprise development in the
            IT/ITES (Information Technology/Information Technology
            Enabled Services) sector, enhanced IT skills, and improved
            access to finance. The restructuring reflects the Kingdom of
            Bhutan's request to revise the scope of the financial
            sector component (component three: strengthening the
            financial sector through IT use) and reallocate some of
            component three's funds to component one (development
            of the IT/ITES sector), while leaving the overall grant
            allocation unchanged. Project development objectives,
            disbursement, financial management and procurement
            arrangements, safeguards, the closing date and
            implementation schedule remain unchanged.

display_title.display_title:
Bhutan - Private Sector
            Development Project : restructuring : Main report
